subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Penguins’ owner Mario Lemieux called a deal to sell the team to a Canadian billionaire “unequivocally” dead and said he was trying to reach a deal with a casino that promised to build an arena for the club.
snippet: Penguins’ owner Mario Lemieux called a deal to sell the team to a Canadian billionaire “unequivocally” dead and said he was trying to reach a deal with a casino that promised to build an arena for the club.
